Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext2" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "AdminContext2" context and select "Set as current context" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error windows pops up with the following message : "unable to apply context 'AdminContext2' Reason: At least one error condition was found in the model."

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Continue" button
Right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold and the "(Current)" string has been appended to the context title

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Validate" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error window pops up, displaying the error message: "Problems encounters during validation"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "OK" button
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Validate" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A warning window pops up, displaying a warning message "Problems encountered during validation"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Details >>" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A warning message tells that the AdminContext\Orchestra\ConfigurationDirectory variable does not point to a valid folder
